source_objects.title: Personal Transformation
source_objects.description: Challenge yourself to become the best that you can be with our courses on personal transformation.

items.title: Radiant Power of Women Online Course
items.headline: Yogic Tools for Every Woman
objectives_summary: Women's Yogic studies, Kundalini Yoga and Meditation.

items.title: Napoleon Hill's 13 Laws of Success (Think and Grow Rich)
items.headline: Self development through positive thinking, self hypnosis, self-discipline, organized planning & decision making.
objectives_summary: You will learn the 13 principles to success as taught by Napoleon Hill.
You will learn to master desire to achieve positive thinking.
You will learn to master faith to achieve positive thinking.

items.title: Routine Mastery: Guide to Healthy Routines and Productivity

visible_instructors.title: Gam Sassoon

items.headline: Making Your Ideal Lifestyle a Reality Through Goal-Setting and Planning
objectives_summary: How To Create a Routine
How to Live Healthy
Design Essential Habits

items.title: Boost Emotional Intelligence, Logic, Wisdom, And Creativity

visible_instructors.name: Alex
visible_instructors.job_title: Business, Entrepreneurship, SEO, Marketing, Amazon, YouTube
visible_instructors.title: Alex Genadinik

items.headline: Boost your IQ, emotional intelligence (EQ), wisdom, creativity, memory, learn philosophy and logic & be more worldly
objectives_summary: Raise your emotional intelligence
Become wiser and have a richer inner life
Learn logic and understand how to use philosophy

items.title: Heart Centered Reiki - Angelic Symbols Healing Certification

visible_instructors.name: Leslie
visible_instructors.job_title: HEART CENTERED REIKI MASTER TEACHER/INTUTIVE CHANNELER
visible_instructors.title: Leslie Paramore

items.headline: Spiritually Heal with Angelic Realms, Learn Divine Channeling, Connect with Angels, Angelic Reiki, Symbols Attunement.
objectives_summary: Become certified as an Advanced Heart Centered Reiki Practitioner, by working with ancient angelic symbols.
Learn about the power of symbols coupled with Reiki energy healing.
Understand the origin of the 54 Sacred Symbols and their unique purposes.

items.title: The Ultimate Memory Improvement Training Program 2.0 ®
items.headline: You Will Learn How To Improve Your Memory, Optimize Your Cognitive Ability, And Increase Your Memory Strength & Ability
objectives_summary: Memory Is One Of The Things You Can Use To Gain A Competitive Edge In Today's Competitive World. We All Know What Memory Is, But Most Of Us Don't Understand How Memory Works, How Memory Can Be Enhanced And Amplified
In This Course You Experience A Scientific Fundamental Approach To First Understand Your Brain, And Then Understand The Human Memory Like You Never Did Before
You Will Learn The Psychological, Neurological And Biological Basis Of Your Memory

items.title: The Quantum Mind: Stop Suffering & Take Back Your Life
items.headline: Learn key ideas in Buddhism, Mindfulness, Neuroscience, Neuroplasticity and be your own life coach
objectives_summary: Students will be able to discuss key ideas in Buddhism, NLP and Spiritual Psychology
Students will have a survey understanding of various bodies of knowledge related to well-being
Students will be able to understand what creates suffering

items.title: Managing The Gifts Of ADHD
items.headline: Exploring your unlimited ADD/HD Greatness.  Learn to manage not medicate.
objectives_summary: Recognize and embrace the gifts of their ADD/HD
Identify the ways in which ADD/HD is a diff-ability instead of a disability
Shift behaviors that will maximize the gift and minimize the curse of ADD/HD

items.title: Positive Psychology
items.headline: Hygge for the 2020s: positive psychology
objectives_summary: Realise the joys in life they missed, are still there, waiting to be claimed - and shared
Slow down and BE
Bring Hygge into their life - and share it

items.title: Neuroplasticity: Changing your Brain for Improving your Life
items.headline: Neuroplasticity & Neuroscience ┃ How to Change your Thinking Pattern, Limiting Beliefs and Habits  ┃ Brain Training.
objectives_summary: Techniques for changing beliefs, creating new habits and new thinking patterns through neuroplasticity
A 7-step process that includes how to overcome, through neuroplasticity and brain training, resistance to changing beliefs and habits
Tips and tricks to make the process smoother

items.title: Traits of the Best by Molly Fletcher
items.headline: Learn from a sports agent's success stories to maximize your business
objectives_summary: Learn how the best in business build and manage relationships
Discover the traits that you can embrace in your own life to become the best at what you do

items.title: Life Coaching For Women - How To Be Happy and Confident
items.headline: Change Your Life - Learn To Create The Life You Want, Reduce Stress, Increase Happiness, and Feel More Confident
objectives_summary: How to manage your time, increase productivity and plan your day, week, month, and year
How to set and achieve your long term and short term goals
How to  overcome procrastination and increase your motivation

items.title: Negotiate Salary: Increase/Double Your Pay In 3-12 Months!
items.headline: Negotiate Salaries - Use simple strategies to negotiate and increase or double your salary in the next 3-12 months!
objectives_summary: Negotiate and increase your salary
Increase your value in the market place
Spot real opportunities

items.title: Mindfulness To Create An Amazing Life
items.headline: Being present
objectives_summary: Enjoy the here and now
Focus on the present rather than the future or past
Know how to become more mindful at will

items.title: The Art of Deep Listening

items.headline: How to improve your listening skills to build relationships and trust
objectives_summary: to develop listening skills to build trust and relationships
to develop a deep listening mindset by listening with purpose, understanding and empathy
to be an effective leader by listening deeply

items.title: Emotional Intelligence: Handle Anger, Anxiety, Fear and More

visible_instructors.name: Aditi
visible_instructors.job_title: NLP Practitioner, EFT practitioner and Graphologist.
visible_instructors.title: Aditi Goyal

items.headline: Learn techniques (EFT &more) to manage anger, fear, guilt & stress, for better health, productivity, & relationships.
objectives_summary: A fundamental skill of coping with emotions, which should ideally be taught in school to everyone.
BONUS:EFT (Emotional Freedom Technique), the quickest and most effective way to neutralise intensely powerful emotions.
Develop better emotional awareness and be in touch with yourself
